titleStmt.title: Characters of vertue and vice described in the persons of the wise-man, the valiant man ... attempted in verse from a treatise of the reverend Joseph Hall, late lord bishop of Exeter / by N. Tate.
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656. Characters of vertues and vices.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
Bishop Hall's "Characters of vertues and vices" was published in 1608. Tate here paraphrases 10 of Hall's 26 "characters".
